relatedRecords.name: DroidconKE
relatedRecords.description: Droidcon is a global conference focused on the engineering of Android applications. Droidcon provides a forum for developers to network with other developers, share techniques, announce apps and products, and to learn and teach.

relatedRecords.name: DevOpsNG Conference
relatedRecords.description: DevOps NG | Largest DevOps community in Nigeria | Join thousands of (Software, DevOps, Cloud and Site Reliability) Engineers and IT experts in Africa, Get updated on news and happenings in the community, get must-read articles, chat with like-minded people, get job offers and more.

relatedRecords.name: DevFest Yamoussoukro 2019
relatedRecords.description: GDG DevFest 2019 Yamoussoukro is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

relatedRecords.name: SwiftcKaigi
relatedRecords.description: # SwiftcKaigi SwiftcKaigi is a 1 day conference for Swift Compiler and foundations/tools for Swift language.
